message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,000. It's a great deal for you, as you know it's worth $12,000 to you. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I'm willing to make a deal, but I need to stay within my budget.

Bob, I understand you're working with a budget, but $9,500 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $10,500. This is a fair price for both of us, and I'm confident you'll find it a great deal considering the value of the product.  Let's try to make this work!
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $10,500, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,800. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to stay within my budget.
